alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 10 at 5:11AM PDT until April 11 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Travel may be impacted along US-97 and through Satus Pass.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
